casmtp.label: Card Access Services Casmtp
casmtp.comment: For more information please visit http://www.cardaccess.com.au

active.label: Enabled
active.comment: Enable this to allow transaction processing through Card Access Services using hosted payment pages

title.label: Title
title.comment: The name that will be shown on the checkout pages

is_test.label: Use Test Gateway
is_test.comment:
Send transactions to the test gateway?
Please be sure to set this to "No" before going live

etx_merchant.label: ETX Merchant ID
etx_merchant.comment:
The ETX merchant ID
This must be set to the value assigned by Card Access Services

hash_auth.label: Hash authentication
hash_auth.comment:
The hash authentication password
This must be set to the value assigned by Card Access Services

useccv.label: Require CVV
useccv.comment: If this is enabled then the cardholder will be required to enter a CVV with each transaction. This may be mandated by your bank as a condition of transaction processing - double check with your bank for more details

cctypes.label: Credit Card Types
cctypes.comment:
List the card types offered during checkout and on the admin screens
Not all credit card types will be supported by your merchant account; in addition, some card types may require an additional merchant account
Once your have setup the merchant account(s) with the relevant financial institutions, please let us know the details as well as which card types you wish to support, this will be configured at the same time as the ETX merchant above

order_status.label: New order status
order_status.comment: Update the order to this status after the transaction has been completed

sort_order.label: Sort order
sort_order.comment: The relative order in which this payment method is shown. The lower the number, the higher up this payment method will appear in the list

allowspecific.label: Payment from applicable countries
allowspecific.comment: Whether to restrict cardholders to certain countries

specificcountry.label: Payment from specific countries
specificcountry.comment:
Select the specific countries to restrict payments to
This only has effect if "Specific Countries" has been selected

proxy_server_host.label: Proxy server host
proxy_server_host.comment:
The hostname or IP address of the proxy server
This is only required if you are using a proxy, otherwise it can be left blank

proxy_server_port.label: Proxy server port
proxy_server_port.comment:
The port number of the proxy server
This is only required if you are using a proxy, otherwise it can be left blank. If a host is specified but the port number is left blank then the port number will default to 8080

proxy_login_username.label: Proxy server username
proxy_login_username.comment:
The username to use when accessing the proxy server
This is only required if you are using a proxy and it requires authentication, otherwise it can be left blank

proxy_login_password.label: Proxy server password
proxy_login_password.comment:
The password to use when accessing the proxy server
This is only required if you are using a proxy and it requires a password, otherwise it can be left blank

log_events.label: Log Events
log_events.comment: Log each payment event into the system log (if enabled)?
